references.author: Walsh, Tamara
references.title: Won't Pay or Can't Pay? Exploring the Use of Fines as a Sentencing Alternative for Public Nuisance and Vagrancy in Queensland
references.abstract: Examines the criminalization of homelessness and poverty through public order offences in Australian law, particularly focusing on vagrancy and public nuisance offences that disproportionately affect homeless individuals.
